title: Beyond Meat, Tesla, Rivian: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today; Tesla shares rise after filings showed Elon Musk sold stock; Rivian jumps again after IPO-day pop
text:
* Rivian Automotive shares were poised to extend their IPO-day pop. The electric-vehicle stock, which jumped in its public-market debut Wednesday, rose a further 7.3% premarket.

* Walt Disney shares lost about 5% ahead of the bell. The world's largest entertainment company posted a slowdown in subscriber sign-ups at its flagship streaming service.

* Nvidia shares rose 2.4% after analysts at Bank of America raised their price target for the chip stock.

* Copper prices rose, boosting shares of U.S. miner Freeport-McMoRan 2.7% ahead of the bell.

* U.S.-listed shares of Wix.com rose 5.9% premarket after the Israeli software firm reported earnings.

* Roblox shares gained 3.7%, after the videogame platform posted strong third-quarter results earlier this week. Roblox is making notable progress in diversifying its player base, writes Heard on the Street columnist Dan Gallagher.

Beyond Meat, Tesla, Rivian: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
